column4: Traffic;Kandal: As efforts continue to move a ------sand carrying ship------ still stranded at the Prek Thmak bridge
column5: authorities have released an announcement for the closure of all types of motorized boat and river traffic along the Mekong River in Khsach Kandal and Muk Kampul district
column6: Kandal province.------The order is effective from 6:00 am on September 13
column8: until a new notice is issued.------*Excessive weight from the ships cargo
column9: along with strong currents are being reported as hampering the removal operation
column10: with some sources saying that cables used by tug boats have snapped.
